channel.title: Hidden Service Tor security advisory: â€œrelay earlyâ€
channel.description:
[html]

Quote The Tor Blog.

[…] Hidden service operators should consider changing the location of their hidden service. […]

For technical information see the full blog post on The Tor Blog.

(This is the same security advisory as Tor security advisory: “relay early” traffic confirmation attack - just highlighting the news for hidden service hosts here.)

[/html]
